thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: Tee Kay

author: Tee Kay
title: Tee Kay
text: I am a first-time customer. I had an unusual shipping experience which resulted in me reporting my postman, but I called and let my representative know and she sent me out a duplicate package free of charge and it came right away. I couldn't have asked for a better manner in which to handle to situation. I was very pleased and I'm pleased with my products. Will definitely shop again and refer to friends.
